text_raw:

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European Union 

(Single Use Plastics) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (No. 516 of 2021)

title: the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of certain plastics on
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following: 

“ “Minister” means the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.”
text_norm: 3 regulation 2(1) principal regulation amended inserting following minister mean minister environment climate communication

title: the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of certain plastics on
heading: 4. Regulation 10(2) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting
text_raw:
4. Regulation 10(2) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting 

after paragraph (2)(a)(i)(II) the following: 

“(III) data on fishing gear containing plastic placed on the market and on 
waste fishing gear collected in the State each year”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 March 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

1 OJ No. L 155, 12.6.2019, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th March, 2022.

title: the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of certain plastics on
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Union (Single Use Plastics) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 516 of 2021) to clarify the Minister with 
responsibility for the functions set out therein and to give further effect to 
Directive (EU) 2019/904/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of certain plastics on the environment 
as regards data collection on fishing gear containing plastic and waste fishing 
gear. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [136]
